channel.title: WoW
channel.description: Well, I am a new player to WoW and I was wondering what class and alliance to pick as i've never played WoW before. Thanks

item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

justinxg27:

Xbox can get boring fast though. That’s why I like WoW, there always bringing new patches out, with new content.

Im pretty sure every Xbox game does the same if you have Xbox live, it just depends on the game, and if it has multiplayer. As far as WoW goes, i never really got into it but none of the classes i saw were really bad.

item.title: WoW
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:22, topic:339585”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=435967.msg3203155#msg3203155 date=1273525086]

Id play it if blizzard took their heads out of their asses and charged less. Id rather pay for xbox live and play hundreds of games online for 8$ then play WoW.

Except average lifespan of a xbox game for a gamer is until he beats the shit out of it and multiplayer. so lets say 60 hours a game. at $50 each game and $8 month fee.

Wow is $30 a game and people that started way back in the beginning are still playing it at $15 a month.

if you add up the numbers WoW is the better value.

of course you could be that one person that plays only one game on the xbox at which point the xbox is the better value.

on ps3 [similar to xbox] i played mw2 for over 200hours and i still play it. and only fucking gay games like oblivion come out with such ridicilous prices.
[/quote]Get a real game, mw2 takes no skill at all…[/quote]
That’s why its fun; i kill everybody and get pissed and throw my microphone out the window because everybody else dont have luck.
And i liekz Resi Evil but i finished all of em so far so…

Read full topic

item.title: WoW
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

I play wow. Two 80’s; Warrior and Death Knight. Obviously you can’t use DK, coz ur not 55. Anyways, just if you don’t know, max lvl is 60, then u gotta buy BC exanpansion, then WOTLK to get to 80. And the new expansion coming out in 2 monthes Cataclsym, to get to 85.

Anyways. Any class can be good, it’s the player that matters, though, being new and all… probably… Warriors, there simple. My first choice ever, they are very good.

Read full topic

I bought it once for a month, but it toke me 8 hours to install on a 4gb ram desktop. . .
Also the file was so huge, I only got lag with 20-30 players in sight…
Plus It’s 2 much, It’s got good graphics but to big of a damn file.

Archer:

Meh, say what you want but I like WoW enough to continue playing after a couple years. You should try all races and classes for yourself to find the one you like best, nobody can tell you but I like Night Elfs, Dwarfs, and Draeneis.
